CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The PDTP - DTBT solution showed two prominent absorption maxima at 450 and 671 nm , while PDTP-BT and PDTP-DT2BT solutions demonstrated two main absorption maxima at 413 and 711 nm and at 480 and 603 nm , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTBT |
| PDTP-BT |
| PDTP-DT2BT |

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are "PDTP - DTBT", "PDTP-BT", and "PDTP-DT2BT". These are the names of the chemical solutions being described.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

The paragraph only contains "Material Name" entities, so there's no need to remove any entities. Here's the table of valid entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTBT |
| PDTP-BT |
| PDTP-DT2BT |

These are the names of the chemical solutions being described.

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are the different solutions (PDTP - DTBT solution, PDTP-BT solution, and PDTP-DT2BT solution) and the spectral features associated with them (two prominent absorption maxima, two main absorption maxima, and the specific wavelengths 450 and 671 nm, 413 and 711 nm, and 480 and 603 nm).
